name: tiddly-drive-2-app
description: Modernized Tiddly Drive 2 Google Drive app integration

scripts.build: node scripts/build.mjs && cd ./info-site && pnpm run build
scripts.icons:ico: convert app/branding/png/icon-16.png app/branding/png/icon-32.png app/branding/png/icon-48.png app/branding/png/icon-64.png app/branding/png/icon-128.png app/branding/png/icon-256.png app/branding/png/favicon.ico
scripts.icons:all: pnpm run icons:clean && for s in 16 32 48 64 120 128 256 512; do WIDTH=$s pnpm run -s icons:single; done && pnpm run -s icons:full && pnpm run -s icons:ico
scripts.assets: pnpm run build && pnpm run icons:all
